name: Night in the Foundation!
description:
This is my first game I have worked on so there are quite a few bugs and mistakes made but this is the final project. 

This game isn't very realistic but I like the concept of it and it fit the criteria I had to meet.

the plot line for this game is as follows,

You and another person you came with have come for a tour before your first shift at the facility which would be the following day. you were just following your tour guide around being told of what not to do and what to do in certain situations and areas within the buildings. But unfortunately the facility malfunctioned, all of the creatures had been let out of their cells and were roaming wild within the building, lights flickering, alarms wailing and once all of that had stopped you found yourself all alone, apart from the creatures that wish to kill you on sight. It is now your job to survive as you try to find your companion as well as find an exit to escape.
